totp.title: Autenticación de dos factores
totp.finishSetupPart1: Para finalizar tu configuración, utiliza este secreto en tu aplicación totp (Google Authenticator o similar):
totp.finishSetupPart2: Después, introduce un código de tu aplicación abajo.
totp.passcodePlaceholder: Un código generado por tu aplicación totp
totp.setupSuccess: ¡Has configurado con éxito la autenticación de dos factores!
totp.disable: Desactivar la autenticación en dos pasos
totp.confirmSuccess: ¡Has confirmado con éxito tu configuración totp y puedes usarla a partir de ahora!
totp.disableSuccess: La autenticación de dos factores se desactivó correctamente.

caldav.title: Caldav
caldav.howTo: Puedes conectar Vikunja a los clientes caldav para ver y gestionar todas las tareas desde diferentes clientes. Introduce esta url en tu cliente:
caldav.more: Más información sobre caldav en Vikunja

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.statusUpdateSuccess: ¡El estado del avatar se ha actualizado correctamente!

deletion.title: Delete your Vikunja Account
deletion.text1: The deletion of your account is permanent and cannot be undone. We will delete all your namespaces, lists, tasks and everything associated with it.
deletion.text2: To proceed, please enter your password. You will receive an email with further instructions.
deletion.requestSuccess: The request was successful. You'll receive an email with further instructions.
deletion.confirmSuccess: You've successfully confirmed the deletion of your account. We will delete your account in three days.
deletion.scheduled: We will delete your Vikunja account at {date} ({dateSince}).
deletion.scheduledCancel: To cancel the deletion of your account, click here.
deletion.scheduledCancelText: To cancel the deletion of your account, please enter your password below:
deletion.scheduledCancelConfirm: Cancel the deletion of my account
deletion.scheduledCancelSuccess: We will not delete your account.

export.title: Export your Vikunja Data
export.description: You can request a copy of all your Vikunja data. This include Namespaces, Lists, Tasks and everything associated to them. You can import this data in any Vikunja instance through the migration function.
export.descriptionPasswordRequired: Please enter your password to proceed:
export.request: Request a copy of my Vikunja Data
export.success: You've successfully requested your Vikunja Data! We will send you an email once it's ready to download.

list.archived: Esta lista está archivada. No es posible crear nuevas o editar tareas o ello.

links.title: Compartir enlaces
links.explanation: Enlaces compartidos te permiten compartir fácilmente una lista con otros usuarios que no tienen una cuenta de Vikunja.
links.name: Nombre (opcional)
links.nameExplanation: All actions done by this link share will show up with the name.
links.passwordExplanation: When authenticating, the user will be required to enter this password.
links.removeText: ¿Está seguro de que desea eliminar este enlace compartido? Ya no será posible acceder a esta lista con este enlace compartido. ¡Esto no se puede deshacer!
links.createSuccess: El enlace compartido se ha creado correctamente.
links.deleteSuccess: El enlace compartido se ha eliminado correctamente

userTeam.notShared: Aún no se ha compartido con {type}.
userTeam.removeText: ¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar este {sharable} del {type}? ¡Esto no se puede deshacer!

gantt.showTasksWithoutDates: Mostrar tareas que no tienen fechas establecidas
gantt.noDates: Esta tarea no tiene fechas establecidas.

kanban.title: Kanban
kanban.doneBucketHint: All tasks moved into this bucket will automatically marked as done.
kanban.doneBucketHintExtended: Todas las tareas que se trasladen al depósito de finalizadas se marcarán como realizadas automáticamente. Todas las tareas marcadas como realizadas desde otro lugar también se moverán.
kanban.doneBucketSavedSuccess: The done bucket has been saved successfully.
kanban.deleteLast: You cannot remove the last bucket.
kanban.addTaskPlaceholder: Introduce el nuevo título de la tarea…
kanban.deleteBucketText1: Are you sure you want to delete this bucket?
kanban.deleteBucketText2: This will not delete any tasks but move them into the default bucket.
kanban.deleteBucketSuccess: The bucket has been deleted successfully.
kanban.bucketTitleSavedSuccess: The bucket title has been saved successfully.
kanban.bucketLimitSavedSuccess: The bucket limit been saved successfully.

namespace.title: Namespaces & Lists
namespace.noneAvailable: You don't have any namespaces right now.
namespace.noLists: This namespace does not contain any lists.
namespace.createList: Create a new list in this namespace.
namespace.search: Type to search for a namespace…

create.title: Create a new namespace
create.explanation: A namespace is a collection of lists you can share and use to organize your lists with. In fact, every list belongs to a namepace.

archive.archiveText: You won't be able to edit this namespace or create new lists until you un-archive it. This will also archive all lists in this namespace.
archive.unarchiveText: You will be able to create new lists or edit it.
archive.description: If a namespace is archived, you cannot create new lists or edit it.

delete.title: Eliminar "{namespace}"
delete.text1: Are you sure you want to delete this namespace and all of its contents?
delete.text2: This includes all lists and tasks and CANNOT BE UNDONE!

attributes.includeNulls: Include Tasks which don't have a value set
attributes.requireAll: Require all filters to be true for a task to show up

create.title: Create A Saved Filter
create.description: Un filtro guardado es una lista virtual que se calcula a partir de un conjunto de filtros cada vez que se accede a él. Una vez creado, aparecerá en un espacio de nombres especial.

delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this saved filter?

migrate.title: Migrate from other services to Vikunja
migrate.titleService: Import your data from {name} into Vikunja
migrate.description: Click on the logo of one of the third-party services below to get started.
migrate.descriptionDo: Vikunja will import all lists, tasks, notes, reminders and files you have access to.
migrate.authorize: To authorize Vikunja to access your {name} Account, click the button below.
migrate.alreadyMigrated1: It looks like you've already imported your stuff from {name} at {date}.
migrate.alreadyMigrated2: Importing again is possible, but might create duplicates. Are you sure?
migrate.confirm: ¡Estoy seguro de que empiece a migrar ahora!
migrate.importUpload: To import data from {name} into Vikunja, click the button below to select a file.

quickAddMagic.hint: You can use Quick Add Magic
quickAddMagic.title: Quick Add Magic
quickAddMagic.intro: When creating a task, you can use special keywords to directly add attributes to the newly created task. This allows to add commonly used attributes to tasks much faster.
quickAddMagic.multiple: You can use this multiple times.
quickAddMagic.label1: To add a label, simply prefix the name of the label with {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.label2: Vikunja will first check if the label already exist and create it if not.
quickAddMagic.label3: To use spaces, simply add a " around the label name.
quickAddMagic.priority1: To set a task's priority, add a number 1-5, prefixed with a {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.priority2: The higher the number, the higher the priority.
quickAddMagic.assignees: To directly assign the task to a user, add their username prefixed with @ to the task.
quickAddMagic.list1: To set a list for the task to appear in, enter its name prefixed with {prefix}.
quickAddMagic.list2: This will return an error if the list does not exist.
quickAddMagic.date: Any date will be used as the due date of the new task. You can use dates in any of these formats:
quickAddMagic.dateWeekday: any weekday, will use the next date with that date
quickAddMagic.dateNth: will use the {day}th of the current month
quickAddMagic.dateTime: Combine any of the date formats with "{time}" (or {timePM}) to set a time.

team.noTeams: You are currently not part of any teams.

edit.userAddedSuccess: The team member was successfully added.

delete.text1: Are you sure you want to delete this team and all of its members?

error.4001: The list task text cannot be empty.
error.4002: The list task does not exist.
error.4003: All bulk editing tasks must belong to the same list.
error.4004: Need at least one task when bulk editing tasks.
error.4005: You do not have the right to see the task.

error.4007: You can't create a task relation with an invalid kind of relation.

error.4015: The task comment does not exist.
error.5003: You do not have access to the specified namespace.
error.5006: The namespace name cannot be empty.
error.5009: You need to have namespace read access to perform that action.
error.5010: This team does not have access to that namespace.
error.5011: This user has already access to that namespace.
error.5012: The namespace is archived and can therefore only be accessed read only.
error.6001: The team name cannot be emtpy.
error.6004: The team already has access to that namespace or list.
error.6005: The user is already a member of that team.

error.7003: You do not have access to that list.
error.8001: This label already exists on that task.
